title: Content Tagging
content: Got content tagging up and running today. Next time you're posting, use it! This is the first step toward creating some cool new ways to sift through Typophile content.
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: This feels like a stupid question now, but how does one tag a post?

Nina - for now, the tagging happens when you create/edit the post. Admins have the ability to go in and add tags to existing posts, and we are doing this slowly. We are hoping in the future to include a way for all users to tag outside of edit mode (Flickr style perhaps), but don't yet have the solution for this.
